Text: Updated Discuss Gas Operations and Nomination Process with Rich Herweck from CoServpst Attached below is the deal that I am currently working with Rich He would like to sit down and discuss how the process will work to supply CoServ Please read the RFP response and I will be putting together a brief summary of the things that will be discussed tomorrow Thanks JD Here is a list of issues for the meeting Laura Can you please get a room for tomorrow Thanks JD

Updated Discuss Weather Derivative for Summer Cc I have gotten some information back from the Weather last week but was unable to find a time for all of us to meet I wanted to discuss the structure that is in the word document below I think this is a structure that is closer to our needs Let me know if this time doesnt work for you Thanks JD Laura Could you please get a room for this meeting Thanks JD

Updated Discuss Weather Derivative Hedge for BurbankCApst I have been talking with Partho from the weather derivative group The premium from the first transaction that we discussed a couple weeks ago was prohibitive to doing the deal ie a million cost for only a million payout I wanted to see if we could sit down and talk about this again because the hedge may actually be appropriate but we may need to further refine our assumptions how many days we expect to be paid on what is a realistic temperature ect in order to get a value that is realistic Let me know if this time works for you guys Laura Could you please get a room for this meeting Thanks JD
FW pooling contract templateOriginal Message From mailto Sent Monday November AM To Buss Jd Subject pooling contract template See attached file Line X Pool Contractdoc

FW TXU Lone Star Pipeline Standard Pooling AgreementOriginal Message From mailto Sent Monday November AM To Buss Jd Subject TXU Lone Star Pipeline Standard Pooling Agreement Here is the standard pooling agreement I noticed that the last two pages in the file are actually the cover sheet and index which should actually be at the front of the document See attached file Standard Pooling Agreementdoc

FW Statement of Operating Conditionspst This is what I got from Dan Original Message From Burns Dan mailtoDan lPasocom Sent Thursday October AM To Buss JD Subject Statement of Operating Conditions Attached is the SOC for the EPGT Texas Pipeline I have attached both the Interstate and Intrastate SOC the main difference in the two is the Intrastate warrenty language If you have any questions please advise Thanks Dan EPGT TPLP Op ConditionsIA NORL FINAL PDFpdf EPGT TPLP Op ConditionsIE NORL FINAL PDFpdf This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

CoServ Proposalpst Tom Eric Daren and Gary Attached below is a file that I have put together detailing out a proposal for gas to CoServ natural gas distribution unit of Denton County Electric Cooperative In this file there is a description of the transaction proposed structure and volumes and term based on the two proposed structures The second file is the actual one page proposal sent by CoServ This proposal is due Wednesday and I need to get offers for index and fixed price term intrastate gas for baseload volumes delivered at the Katy Waha and Carthage Lonestar connections I also need to get an offer for swing intrastate gas at the exact same locations Shout at me if you have questions or if we need to discuss this further Thanks JD

FW Top Customer BreakdownPST Sent this to Thomas Martin instead Let me know if you have any questions Thanks JD Original Message From Buss Jd Sent Monday January PM To Vickers Frank Tycholiz Barry Redmond Brian Bryan Gary Thomas Martin Lagrasta Fred Luce Laura Shively Hunter S Breslau Craig Arnold John Neal Scott Subject Top Customer Breakdown Attached below is a file detailing the top Customers for the whole floor and who will be responsible for contacting those customers as part of Phase This was put together per this mornings meeting If you have any questions or changes please contact me Thank you JD Buss

FW List of CustomersPST Original Message From Buss Jd Sent Friday January PM To Bryan Gary Redmond Brian Vickers Frank Lagrasta Fred Tycholiz Barry Cc Subject List of Customers Attached below is a combined form showing the customer lists of all the gas groups and how each group has prioritized their customers I will continue to review this list over the weekend If you have any changes please let me know by responding to me at both my work email address and at my home address Thank you
Business Plan Cc PST Here is the business plan for Texas This is a working document so if you have changes please let myself or Gary know Thanks JD

Customer ListPST The first file is the Customer list from the Texas region perspective The second list is the one from Barry that I have input phase and numbers for several companies based on the Texas region list and based on the companies that had already been chosen Let me know if you have any questions Thanks JD

Revised Business Plan for TexasPST This is an updated business plan based on some information that Tom provided to me This also has the budget in the excel that Tom provided If you have any questions please let me know This will continue to be a work in progress Thanks JD

Offer on Gas Daily Option at Waha and PermLarry A customer in TX is looking for gas supply to two power plants We are looking for a gas daily fixed price straddle at Waha and Perm in order to give the customer flexibility Volumes term and strike are shown in the file below Let me know if you have any questions Thanks JD Buss Work Cell Email
